attributes.action: return the police to being public servants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: return the police first duty to being public servants and responding at all times to help and assist the general public we seem to have moved a long way from this situation

rejection.details: We can not accept such a general e-petition without further evidence.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
